Package index

All functions

check_residual_autocorrelation()
Check and visualise residual autocorrelation in a fitted neurogam model
eeg_data
Simulated EEG data
find_clusters()
Find contiguous clusters in a time series
make_bgam_formula()
Build a brms formula for time-resolved BGAMMs
plot_eeg()
Plot spatio-temporal EEG data as topographies or 2D surfaces
plot_sensors()
Plot EEG sensor positions on a 2D scalp
ppc()
Posterior predictive checks
print(<clusters_results>)
Print method for clusters_results objects
print(<recommend_k_results>)
Print method for recommend_k_results objects
recommend_k()
Recommend a smooth basis dimension k via effective complexity "knee" detection
st_take_n_times()
Select approximately equally spaced times
summary(<clusters_results>)
Summary method for clusters_results objects
summary(<recommend_k_results>)
Summary method for recommend_k_results objects
testing_through_time()
Time-resolved testing based on BGAMMs
